page_content: Semantic Graph Construction: To establish se- mantic relations between the nearby utterances and to capture both inter-speaker and intra-speaker ef- fects, we define a semantic graph G,= (V;,Es) based on the conversational semantic-aware depen- dency. Each utterance is represented by a node and different connection edges represent directed relations (past and future), V; denotes a set of utter- ance nodes, and FE, C V, x V, is a set of relations that represent the semantic similarity between the utterances, defined as Eq. (10).
